entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gillam
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:13 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow early this morning. Becoming sunny this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 48 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:28 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
